title: BBQ-Glazed Meatloaf
ingredients: 2 pounds ground beef, or pork veal
1/2 cup Barbecue Sauce for brushing meatloaf
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Mix ground meat, bread crumbs, onion, egg, ½ cup SBR Original Barbecue Sauce, cheese and seasonings in large bowl or stand mixer with paddle attachment. Mix until ingredients are incorporated.
Shape into a loaf on shallow baking pan. Brush remaining ½ cup barbecue sauce over top.
Bake until minimum internal temperature is 165 degrees F in center (approximately 45-50 minutes). Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
